page.title: 07BMX IN THE 80'S
page.content: Most children in the 1980's have got BMX bicycles or would like one.The most popular make between{racing}and freestyle in this village is freestyle.Freestyle is when you do tricks and try not to put your feet on the ground. On the{13th of June}down at the car park by the playing fields the youth club held a{BMX}display.They started off by doing any trick that they wanted to do then they started to jump off a ramp and over a{fire}but when Tim Weston went over the fire it was at its highest point so he did a front wheel crash because of the smoke. Marcus Riley who was taking care of the fire{extinguisher}thought that it was on fire off and let off the extinguisher by mistake.He had to pay for a new one.
